document_title: Thumb flexor tendonitis: Causes, symptoms, treatment
subsection_content: Some occupations are at high risk of disease such as teachers, farmers, barbers, surgeons, craftsmen... They have to use their thumbs a lot, often performing pinching, grasping, … leads to tendinitis;; Due to injury in daily activities or while playing sports;; Complications from some diseases such as diabetes, rheumatoid arthritis, psoriatic arthritis, gout...
